import React from 'react' import clasees from './MealItem.module.css' import MealItemForm from './MealItemForm' import { useContext } from 'react' import cart_Context from '../../../Store/cart_context' export default function MealItem(props) { const cartCxt = useContext(cart_Context) const price = `$${props.price.toFixed(2)}` const addToCartHandler = (amount) => { cartCxt.addItem(amount) } return (

  • {props.name}

    {props.description}
    {price}
    • ) }
